name: Queens Road
overview: In Queens Road the player have to choose and then train a princess to become the next queen. There are 5 different countries: Arsea,Drasion,Caerleon,Dynaress and Zol each one with a princess to chose. To do that the player has to make choices and improve the stats of his princess. The better the stats of the princess the most respect that she will have of his people and generals. You can view the profiles of the five princess in the main menu. During each month the princess can go around his kingdom to talk to people in taverns, churchs, market, etc. In the battles the player can take decissions like who unit will attack or if the troops have to retreat, attack or defend.
